data.text:
Well then everyone, as we once again pray for 
the continued success of the Mejiro family, 
please enjoy today's New Year's party.
data.name: Party MC
data.processed:
<story>Well then everyone, as we once again pray for 
<story>the continued success of the Mejiro family, 
<story>please enjoy today's New Year's party.

data.text:
Alright! Let's enjoy this party to the fullest, McQueen! 
Should I start with sushi?! Or maybe crab?! I can't decide!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Alright! Let's enjoy this party to the fullest, McQueen! 
<story>Should I start with sushi?! Or maybe crab?! I can't decide!

data.text:
Right now, I'm wondering why you're even here in the first place. 
This is the Mejiro Family's New Year's party, you know.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Right now, I'm wondering why you're even here in the first place. 
<story>This is the Mejiro Family's New Year's party, you know.

data.text:
Aw, don't be such a stiff! We're teammates that have exchanged 
sports drinks― which basically makes us like family!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Aw, don't be such a stiff! We're teammates that have exchanged 
<story>sports drinks― which basically makes us like family!

data.text:
C'mon, before all that fresh seafood escapes back to the deep, 
let's go capture them with these nets we call stomachs!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>C'mon, before all that fresh seafood escapes back to the deep, 
<story>let's go capture them with these nets we call stomachs!

data.text: I have no idea what you even mean…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I have no idea what you even mean…

data.text: Happy New Year, McQueen.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Happy New Year, McQueen.

data.text:
Ryan and Dober, Happy New Year. 
I look forward to working with you this year, too.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Ryan and Dober, Happy New Year. 
<story>I look forward to working with you this year, too.

data.text:
Yeah, likewise. 
Let's all do our best this year too.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, likewise. 
<story>Let's all do our best this year too.

data.text:
Last year, Dober finished with a G1 victory, so she'll have 
momentum going in to this one. I've been hearing rumors too so, 
I have high expectations.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Last year, Dober finished with a G1 victory, so she'll have 
<story>momentum going in to this one. I've been hearing rumors too so, 
<story>I have high expectations.

data.text:
Ehehe, you're really popular aren't you? As another member 
of the Mejiro family, it makes me happy too.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, you're really popular aren't you? As another member 
<story>of the Mejiro family, it makes me happy too.

data.text:
I-it's not like I wanted to be popular or anything…! 
I just entered races that I wanted to win.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>I-it's not like I wanted to be popular or anything…! 
<story>I just entered races that I wanted to win.

data.text:
Besides, if we're talking about high expectations, 
isn't there someone else we should be talking about?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Besides, if we're talking about high expectations, 
<story>isn't there someone else we should be talking about?

data.text: Ah, I saw her a little earlier but…
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Ah, I saw her a little earlier but…

data.text:
Bright-ojousama, it's almost time for your speech, 
so please make your way to the stage.
data.name: Party MC
data.processed:
<story>Bright-ojousama, it's almost time for your speech, 
<story>so please make your way to the stage.

data.text: …Speech?
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>…Speech?

data.text:
About your achievements from last year! 
I spoke with you about this just a short while ago!
data.name: Party MC
data.processed:
<story>About your achievements from last year! 
<story>I spoke with you about this just a short while ago!

data.text: Hmmmmm～…
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Hmmmmm～…

data.text:
…Ah, by speech you meant giving a speech. 
Yes, I understand～
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>…Ah, by speech you meant giving a speech. 
<story>Yes, I understand～

data.text: I'm begging you～, please～…
data.name: Party MC
data.processed: <story>I'm begging you～, please～…

data.text:
Oh my, Ryan-oneesama. 
And McQueen-sama and Dober too, how do you do～?
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Oh my, Ryan-oneesama. 
<story>And McQueen-sama and Dober too, how do you do～?

data.text: As usual, Ryan gets the oneesama treatment I see.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>As usual, Ryan gets the oneesama treatment I see.

data.text: Ahaha… well, I did look after her a lot when we were younger.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Ahaha… well, I did look after her a lot when we were younger.

data.text:
Bright, your [Spring Tenno Sho] victory was truly magnificent. 
And it seems you've won the URA award as well.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Bright, your [Spring Tenno Sho] victory was truly magnificent. 
<story>And it seems you've won the URA award as well.

data.text:
The Tenno Sho is a race inexorably linked to the Mejiro family. 
I feel a deep connection to it as well.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>The Tenno Sho is a race inexorably linked to the Mejiro family. 
<story>I feel a deep connection to it as well.

data.text:
All of this, is due to Ryan-oneesama encouraging me on 
as a fellow team member. And so I offer my deepest gratitude.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>All of this, is due to Ryan-oneesama encouraging me on 
<story>as a fellow team member. And so I offer my deepest gratitude.

data.text:
In Classic grade you had a string of unfortunate 
races, too. When you started getting results in 
Senior grade, it really made me happy.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>In Classic grade you had a string of unfortunate 
<story>races, too. When you started getting results in 
<story>Senior grade, it really made me happy.

data.text:
But just like this, this year let's keep 
aiming together for even bigger titles!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>But just like this, this year let's keep 
<story>aiming together for even bigger titles!

data.text:
…But this year, it'll probably be somewhat 
difficult to get good results, I think.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>…But this year, it'll probably be somewhat 
<story>difficult to get good results, I think.

data.text: The "Golden Generation"… is it?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>The "Golden Generation"… is it?

data.text:
Yeah, this year they're moving up to Senior grade so there will 
definitely be plenty of chances to compete against them, right?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, this year they're moving up to Senior grade so there will 
<story>definitely be plenty of chances to compete against them, right?

data.text: Hmmmmm～…
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Hmmmmm～…

data.text:
No matter who my opponent is, 
I will just do what it is that I must.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>No matter who my opponent is, 
<story>I will just do what it is that I must.

data.text:
Even with the feelings from all these regrettable 
defeats, I've finally reached the pinnacle. 
I will not easily hand over my spot.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Even with the feelings from all these regrettable 
<story>defeats, I've finally reached the pinnacle. 
<story>I will not easily hand over my spot.

data.text:
…That's why, I will, without a doubt, meet those expectations. 
With consecutive victories at the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>…That's why, I will, without a doubt, meet those expectations. 
<story>With consecutive victories at the [Spring Tenno Sho].

data.text:
To the Mejiro family, the Tenno Sho are special 
races. To win them consecutively would be an 
achievement as remarkable as McQueen's.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>To the Mejiro family, the Tenno Sho are special 
<story>races. To win them consecutively would be an 
<story>achievement as remarkable as McQueen's.

data.text:
Ehehe, Bright may look like this, but she's actually 
quite a stubborn one, you know. After she's decided 
to win, she'll definitely win.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, Bright may look like this, but she's actually 
<story>quite a stubborn one, you know. After she's decided 
<story>to win, she'll definitely win.

data.text:
Aaah, Bright-ojousama! You're still here?! 
It's almost time for your speech!
data.name: Party MC
data.processed:
<story>Aaah, Bright-ojousama! You're still here?! 
<story>It's almost time for your speech!

data.text: …Speech?
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>…Speech?

data.text: Not again～!!
data.name: Party MC
data.processed: <story>Not again～!!

data.text: Bright's Spring goal is the [Spring Tenno Sho] is it…?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Bright's Spring goal is the [Spring Tenno Sho] is it…?

data.text: Is something wrong, McQueen?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Is something wrong, McQueen?

data.text: No… I suppose, that was to be expected.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>No… I suppose, that was to be expected.

data.text:
God, Buddha, and Shiraoki-sama! I pray that this 
year will be a year filled with great accomplishments!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>God, Buddha, and Shiraoki-sama! I pray that this 
<story>year will be a year filled with great accomplishments!

data.text:
…and, that the sweets I eat after meals 
won't make me gain weight…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…and, that the sweets I eat after meals 
<story>won't make me gain weight…!

data.text:
As the year begins, Special Week now 
becomes a part of the Senior class.
data.processed:
<story>As the year begins, Special Week now 
<story>becomes a part of the Senior class.

data.text:
To celebrate the beginning of a new chapter, 
together with the members of , we're here for 
our first shrine visit of the New Year.
data.processed:
<story>To celebrate the beginning of a new chapter, 
<story>together with the members of , we're here for 
<story>our first shrine visit of the New Year.

data.text:
Everyone, sorry for making you wait! I've 
thoroughly had my prayers heard!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Everyone, sorry for making you wait! I've 
<story>thoroughly had my prayers heard!

data.text:
It seemed like you were praying pretty hard there. 
…By the way, who's Shiraoki-sama?
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>It seemed like you were praying pretty hard there. 
<story>…By the way, who's Shiraoki-sama?

data.text: Seems like Fukukitaru's been influencing you…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Seems like Fukukitaru's been influencing you…

data.text:
You shouldn't rely only on prayers though. 
You, yourself, need to properly put in the effort too.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You shouldn't rely only on prayers though. 
<story>You, yourself, need to properly put in the effort too.

data.text:
You shouldn't rely only on prayers though. 
You, yourself, need to properly put in the effort too.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You shouldn't rely only on prayers though. 
<story>You, yourself, need to properly put in the effort too.

data.text:
Of course, even in training I'll be putting 
in a lot more effort than before!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Of course, even in training I'll be putting 
<story>in a lot more effort than before!

data.text:
After all, taking first place in a race is not something that's 
easy, I've been made to reeeeeally understand that…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>After all, taking first place in a race is not something that's 
<story>easy, I've been made to reeeeeally understand that…!

data.text: …You've had a bunch of really close races lately, too.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>…You've had a bunch of really close races lately, too.

data.text:
After winning the [Derby], Special Week had continued in to the 
fall races with momentum, however―
data.processed:
<story>After winning the [Derby], Special Week had continued in to the 
<story>fall races with momentum, however―

data.text:
She's pulling away, she's pulling away! Seiun 
Sky is escaping! Finally Special Week is coming 
from the outside! But, it's Seiun Sky!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>She's pulling away, she's pulling away! Seiun 
<story>Sky is escaping! Finally Special Week is coming 
<story>from the outside! But, it's Seiun Sky!

data.text:
Seiun Sky, in the [Kikka Sho] now crosses the goal 
in first place!! Her time is― an astonishing 
3:03.2! Amazing, it's a world record!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Seiun Sky, in the [Kikka Sho] now crosses the goal 
<story>in first place!! Her time is― an astonishing 
<story>3:03.2! Amazing, it's a world record!

data.text:
The "Derby Uma Musume" Special Week finishes 
3 lengths behind in 2nd place!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The "Derby Uma Musume" Special Week finishes 
<story>3 lengths behind in 2nd place!

data.text:
El Condor, it's El Condor! Air Groove and 
Special Week are catching up but, it's El Condor Pasa!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>El Condor, it's El Condor! Air Groove and 
<story>Special Week are catching up but, it's El Condor Pasa!

data.text:
Classic grade Uma Musume El Condor Pasa, among this group 
of champions in the [Japan Cup], scores a dazzling victory!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Classic grade Uma Musume El Condor Pasa, among this group 
<story>of champions in the [Japan Cup], scores a dazzling victory!

data.text:
Her contemporary, Special Week, was unable to 
catch her on the straight and finished 3rd!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Her contemporary, Special Week, was unable to 
<story>catch her on the straight and finished 3rd!

data.text: Sei-chan and El-chan were both really amazing…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Sei-chan and El-chan were both really amazing…

data.text:
For Spe-san who won the [Derby] to not be able 
to easily win, everyone in the "Golden Generation" 
is really strong, aren't they…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>For Spe-san who won the [Derby] to not be able 
<story>to easily win, everyone in the "Golden Generation" 
<story>is really strong, aren't they…?

data.text: On top of that, this year she'll be entering the Senior grade.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>On top of that, this year she'll be entering the Senior grade.

data.text:
It won't be just her usual rivals, so that you aren't left behind 
by the older and younger generations, let's put in the effort!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>It won't be just her usual rivals, so that you aren't left behind 
<story>by the older and younger generations, let's put in the effort!

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah!

data.text:
Even if her defeats continue, Special Week will stay positive and 
continue to work hard. The passion for her dream, even in the New 
Year, remains unchanged.
data.processed:
<story>Even if her defeats continue, Special Week will stay positive and 
<story>continue to work hard. The passion for her dream, even in the New 
<story>Year, remains unchanged.

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: …is something wrong, Suzuka?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>…is something wrong, Suzuka?

data.text: …is something wrong, Suzuka?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>…is something wrong, Suzuka?

data.text: Ah… No, not really…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah… No, not really…

data.text:
It's all well and good that she's Senior class now, 
but have you decided on what Spe's Spring goal might be?
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>It's all well and good that she's Senior class now, 
<story>but have you decided on what Spe's Spring goal might be?

data.text:
Ah, I've also been wondering about that! 
Trainer-san, what do you think?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I've also been wondering about that! 
<story>Trainer-san, what do you think?

data.text:
Truthfully, I think Spe's abilities are really high. 
Specifically, I want to take full advantage of her stamina that 
allows for long spurts.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Truthfully, I think Spe's abilities are really high. 
<story>Specifically, I want to take full advantage of her stamina that 
<story>allows for long spurts.

data.text:
That's why I was thinking of making Spe's 
Spring goal the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>That's why I was thinking of making Spe's 
<story>Spring goal the [Spring Tenno Sho].

data.text:
That's why I was thinking of making Spe's 
Spring goal the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>That's why I was thinking of making Spe's 
<story>Spring goal the [Spring Tenno Sho].

data.text: [Spring Tenno Sho]…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>[Spring Tenno Sho]…!

data.text:
Oh, that sounds good! 
I want to see Spe-chan running in the [Spring Tenno Sho] too!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Oh, that sounds good! 
<story>I want to see Spe-chan running in the [Spring Tenno Sho] too!

data.text:
Since our team has a bunch of experienced champions, 
they can teach you some tips for the race!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Since our team has a bunch of experienced champions, 
<story>they can teach you some tips for the race!

data.text:
McQueen-chan and Rice-san, 
both of them were really cool when they won～…
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed:
<story>McQueen-chan and Rice-san, 
<story>both of them were really cool when they won～…

data.text:
Yeah, yeah! 
I've looked up to them ever since!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, yeah! 
<story>I've looked up to them ever since!

data.text: E-ehehe…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>E-ehehe…

data.text:
If there's anything Rice can do, she'll help out. 
Spe-san, let's do our best together.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>If there's anything Rice can do, she'll help out. 
<story>Spe-san, let's do our best together.

data.text: Thank you very much～! Of course, I look forward to it!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Thank you very much～! Of course, I look forward to it!

data.text:
Well then, let's go check out the food stalls. 
Today it'll be my treat.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Well then, let's go check out the food stalls. 
<story>Today it'll be my treat.

data.text:
Enjoy it to your heart's content, 
and let's work hard this year too!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Enjoy it to your heart's content, 
<story>and let's work hard this year too!

data.text:
Yeah! Aim for "Victory at the Tenno Sho"! 
Aim for "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"～!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! Aim for "Victory at the Tenno Sho"! 
<story>Aim for "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"～!

data.text: Saying that, Special Week raised her hand in the air.
data.processed: <story>Saying that, Special Week raised her hand in the air.

data.text:
Her dream still hadn't taken shape yet, 
but still I felt that I could see her taking hold of that dream.
data.processed:
<story>Her dream still hadn't taken shape yet, 
<story>but still I felt that I could see her taking hold of that dream.
